page.title: 16Life on a Farm.
page.content: Stanley lives on a farm. He is ten years old and he helps on the farm. He has got a sister called Anne and she helps on the farm. Stanley's dad gets up at 5.00am and Anne Stanley's sister gets up at 7.30am. Stanley gets up at 7.00am. Anne gets the cows in at night to be milked. She gets them in at about 5.30pm. Stanley goes to school by walking over the fields. This is unusual in 1985. The farm has been there over 250 years ,Stanley's family have been there 200 years. Stanley's dad grows vegetables in the garden for family use.The vegetables he grows are cabbages, cauliflower, and purple sprouting, lettuces,runner beans and peas.He keeps sheep,cows and hens and pigs.Stanley's dad helps on the farm as well. He plants the crops. The crops they grow are mostly grass and corn.
